== Getting Involved ==
=== Join Ubuntu GNOME Packaging Sub-Team ===
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-gnome-packaging | Ubuntu GNOME Packaging Team]]</nowiki>

* More information can be found <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/GettingInvolved | Getting Involved Page]]</nowiki>.

=== I am NEW to Packaging, How Can I help? ===
Congratulation, you are the best and perfect candidate who actually can help us package apps for the upcoming release. If you are new to all this, please read '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Packaging | this page]]</nowiki>'''. If you have any question, join the mailing list and just ask :)

=== Ubuntu GNOME Packaging Team Mailing List ===
Once you join Ubuntu GNOME Packaging Sub-Team, automatically, you will be subscribed to the mailing list of Ubuntu GNOME Packaging Team and this is the address:
ubuntu-gnome-packaging@lists.launchpad.net

=== Share Your Findings or Ask Qs ===
It is '''VERY''' important to share your findings with the team. Also, you can ask anything on the mailing list as well. So, it is a must-do step :)
